meta.title: Francis W. Parker Charter Essential School

meta.name: description
meta.content: A six-year public secondary school of choice located in Devens, MA, the Francis W. Parker Charter Essential School is open by lottery admissions to all residents of Massachusetts in grades seven through twelve.

meta.name: generator

body.div: JavaScript Disabled. For a better experience on this website please enable JavaScript in your browser.

p.strong: Parker School will NOT hold classes on campus for remainder of the current school year.

div.script: $(window).load(function() { $('#slide-show-loader-7917').fadeOut('slow'); $('#slide-show-7917').css({ 'visibility':'visible' }).animate({ 'filter': 'alpha(opacity=100)', 'opacity': '1' }, 500); $.fn.fadeInElements = function() { $(this).find('.slide-show-overlay').delay(250).fadeIn('slow'); $(this).find('.slide-show-headlines').delay(350).fadeIn('slow'); $(this).find('.slide-show-caption').delay(400).fadeIn('slow'); }; $.fn.fadeOutElements = function() { $(this).find('.slide-show-overlay').hide(); $(this).find('.slide-show-headlines').hide(); $(this).find('.slide-show-caption').hide(); }; $('#slide-show-7917').bxSlider({ mode: 'horizontal', pause: 4000, auto: true, speed: 2000, pagerCustom: '#slide-show-pager-7917', nextText: '', prevText: '', nextSelector: '#slide-show-next-7917', prevSelector: '#slide-show-prev-7917', onSlideAfter: function (currentSlideNumber, totalSlideQty, currentSlideHtmlObject) { $('#slide-show-7917').find('.slide-show-active').removeClass('slide-show-active').fadeOutElements(); $('ul#slide-show-7917 > li').eq(currentSlideHtmlObject + 1).addClass('slide-show-active').fadeInElements(); }, onSliderLoad: function () { $('ul#slide-show-7917 > li').eq(1).addClass('slide-show-active').fadeInElements(); } }); }); // Responsively scaling down height of slideshow with preset breakpoints var slideShow = $('#slide-show-7917'); var slideShowItems = $(slideShow).find('.slide-show-item'); var SSoriginalWidth = $(slideShowItems).width(); var SSoriginalHeight = $(slideShowItems).height(); var SSmaxHeightSetting = '9999'; var aspectRatio = 0.5625; $(window).on('resize', function () { var SSnewWidth = $(slideShowItems).width(); // find the new height based on 16x9 ratio var SSnewHeight = SSnewWidth * aspectRatio ; // if the ratio is greater than the original max height, fall back to the max height // so we don't end up serving up a ridiculously huge image on a huge monitor. // THIS WILL CAUSE CROPPING but it's unavoidable if (SSnewHeight > SSmaxHeightSetting) { $(slideShowItems).css({ 'height':SSmaxHeightSetting+'px' }); } else { $(slideShowItems).css({ 'height':Math.round(SSnewHeight)+'px' }); } // Headline Centering / Middling $('.slide-show-headlines').each(function(){ var headlineOverlayHtAdjust = $(this).height()/2; $(this).css({ 'marginTop':-headlineOverlayHtAdjust+'px' }); }); }).resize();

div.div: Division 1 and 2 students will be testing on various days during the months of March, April, May, and June...

div.div: You can pick out which raffles you'd like to try from the comfort of your own laptop, phone, or desktop PC...

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

div.p: Students and parents looking for domain, division, and class information should sign in to the portal system using the Sign In link in the top-right corner of any page on this website.
The resources available on this website are more general and available without signing in.

div.div: Presenters from Parker's 2018 Common Principles, Uncommon Lives Event talk about what Parker has meant to them. Donate Today via Web or Venmo @ParkerCharter

address.p:
49 Antietam St, Devens, MA 01434
Phone (978) 772-3293 | Fax (978) 772-3295
